programme.title: Trinayani
programme.sub-title: S01 : E376 Trinayani S1 E376
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: 4x4
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 Land Rover Special
programme.desc: The Land Rover Defender is one of the oldest offroad car models. We took a look at this iconic vehicle and 70 years of Land Rover history. Also: we took the Range Rover Evoque, the most recent model of the British brand, to the legendary Silk Road.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E47 Close to the ground
programme.desc: In their 4 series BMW took into account that sporty vehicles need a low center of gravity. In the manufacturer's range of vehicles this model is closest to the asphalt. We compared the BMW 435i and Porsche's Cayman S and took a look at the Alfa Romeo 4C.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E49 Athletes on stilts - Power SUVs
programme.desc: Since the rising popularity of SUVs compact models have become a new trend, so the manufacturers started offering more models and pushing their performance. We took a look at the competitors Audi RS Q3, Mercedes-AMG GLA 45 and Porsche Macan Turbo.

programme.title: Motorcycles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E32 Stereotypes on Two Wheels
programme.desc: Scooters, stereotypes on two wheels? It doesn't always have to be a classic Vespa! We take a look at three alternatives: Kymco's big scooter xciting 500 i that feels like riding on a sofa, Piaggio's three-wheeler MP3 500 with two front wheels that promises more dynamic driving pleasure and the powerful electric scooter e-max from China.

programme.title: Motorcycles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E38 Trikes
programme.desc: Whether taking it easy and cruising, or firing it up and drifting - trikes, scooters and three-wheeled bike conversions all have their own charm and driving dynamics, especially the trikes. We take a closer look at four rather exotic motorcycles: the Rewaco RF1 Turbo, Piaggio's MP3 and bike conversions for the Suzuki 800 Intruder and the Triumph Rocket III Touring.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S03 : E152 La Dolce Vita
programme.desc: With the Alfieri, Maserati in 2014 celebrated their anniversary with the introduction of a beautiful grand tourer. In remembrance and as part of the three-day celebration, Maserati organised a cruise from Bologna to Torino with some of their most iconic cars.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 Fiat Dino
programme.desc: The Fiat Dino Spider is one of the most beautiful cabriolets of the 1960s. Its impeccable design was created by Pininfarina, and only 525 units were built. Under its hood growls a Ferrari V6 engine.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E45 50 Years Corvette Stingray
programme.desc: 1963 saw the launch of the Chevrolet Corvette Stingray, the brand's answer to established sports car models by Jaguar, Maserati and others. Many consider it to be the most exciting sports car of all time. We pay tribute to this classic.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E34 The Advantages of All-wheel Drive
programme.desc: We took the all-wheel model of the Mazda CX-5 off the road in order to test its terrain capabilities. In addition: what does the third generation of BMW's so-called SAV X5 have to offer? And: Kia's compact SUV, the Sportage.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S03 : E60 Typically German
programme.desc: What are the characteristics of a typical German car? Do stereotypes like functionality, reliability but also a certain dullness paint a realistic picture? Also, we explored if the Volkswagen Golf GTE could bring new impulses to the brand's model range.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E118 Batman's Dreams: Supercars in Acceleration
programme.desc: The clash of the convertibles, the Nissan 370 Z in comparison to Porsche's Boxster S. Also: the exclusive one-off high-performance sports car Maybach Exelero. And: a dream of a sports car, a vehicle of superlatives, the Bugatti Veyron Vitesse.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E129 Jaguar F-Type
programme.desc: Jaguar found their way back to the world of sports cars. The F-Type is able to take on the competition like the BMW Z4. We also took a closer look at two other competitors, the Porsche Boxster S and Nissan's 370 Z.

programme.title: Top 10 Show
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 The Ten Most Fuel-efficient Cars
programme.desc: Not everyone can afford to pay vast sums of money for fuel. We present our top 10 most economical cars in terms of fuel consumption.

programme.title: Top 10 Show
programme.sub-title: S01 : E30 The Best Beastly Car Names
programme.desc: Car models are named after all sorts of things, from countries to ancient deities to animals. We take a look at the top 10 cars named after animals.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 The Ambulance
programme.desc: Stunt coordinator Domi’s latest idea for the Stunt Heroes team involves an old ambulance that is prepared so that the stuntman can jump right through the ambulance with his car.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 The Pile-Up
programme.desc: Fog, darkness and a pileup involving multiple cars, the Stunt Heroes want to recreate such a scene as part of a stunt with burning people, a fireman who arrives late at the scene and a car that flies through the air.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E129 Jaguar F-Type
programme.desc: Jaguar found their way back to the world of sports cars. The F-Type is able to take on the competition like the BMW Z4. We also took a closer look at two other competitors, the Porsche Boxster S and Nissan's 370 Z.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S03 : E173 Maserati Ghibli
programme.desc: With the Ghibli, Maserati advanced into a more affordable market segment. But the competition is strong. In addition: taking the Maserati GranCabrio MC on a cruise through the Alps.

programme.title: Top 10 Show
programme.sub-title: S01 : E38 The Most Beautiful Vintage Cars
programme.desc: There are classic cars that are undisputed beauties when it comes to design and look. We take a look at our top 10 most beautiful classic cars.

programme.title: Top 10 Show
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 The Most Successful Cars in the 24h Race
programme.desc: 24-hour races are one of the toughest tests for man and machine in motor racing. We present the most successful cars in this racing category in our Top 10 list.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E117 Million-Dollar Toys from the Middle East
programme.desc: The McLaren MP4 12C Spider, one of many high-performance sports cars featured at the Doha Motor Show in Qatar. Also: the creations of manufacturers like Lamborghini, Bertone or Porsche but also the first Arab super sports car, the Lykan HyperSport.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S01 : E94 Audi at Le Mans
programme.desc: At the 2012 Le Mans 24 Hours, Audi entered the R18 e-tron quattro for the first time. Also: the Porsche Cayenne GTS, the model between the S and the Turbo. And: the Mercedes-Benz CLS Shooting Brake.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E54 Sporty Fords
programme.desc: The 1955 Ford Thunderbird is part of Henry Ford's motorsports legacy. In addition: the Ford Capri from the May car tuning company is as fast as a 1970s Porsche. And: the Ford Mustang, the progenitor of the so-called pony car.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E104 Lamborghini
programme.desc: Sant'Agata Bolognese, the home of the iconic Italian sports car manufacturer Lamborghini, is the perfect place to take a look under the hood of the different Gallardo models. Also: cruising through Rome in an Aventador LP700-4.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E38 Scrapyard Gold
programme.desc: It is not too unusual to find hidden gems of automotive history in a perfect condition in barns or scrap yards. Also: the MGC GT Sebring, that was built for the 12 Hours of Sebring race.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S03 : E71 Mobility in Eastern Europe
programme.desc: In the 1950s, companies like Tatra from Czechoslovakia introduced advanced, even pioneering automobiles. The clientele was exclusive, which is why now these streamlined cars are big rarities. We tracked down the owner of a 1937 Tatra T87.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E51 Open Air Concert
programme.desc: As an homage to driving top-down we took a look at three of the most beautiful convertibles. The animalistic sound of the Audi S3 convertible's 4-cylinder is astonishing. But what about the Nissan 370 Z Roadster? Or Porsche's Boxster GTS?

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 Topless on the road
programme.desc: Convertibles suggest to the feeling of freedom while driving a car. We took a look at what Opel's Cascada and Adam convertible models had to offer. Also: what does the BMW 3 series Gran Turismo have in common with its bigger brother from the 5 series?

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E124 Special: 24h of Le Mans - Track Days
programme.desc: Two weeks before the start of the 24 hours of Le Mans, all teams are busy testing their cars on the traditional long distance track in France. Bad weather, accidents and a lot of tension, we documented the official test days in 2013.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S03 : E190 V8 Power
programme.desc: We took a look at Mercedes-Benz's first convertible model in their S-class. Also: for the Chevrolet Camaro's 50th anniversary in 2016 the brand released the sixth generation of their classic. And: a mountain cruise with the Corvette C7 convertible.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Episode 12
programme.desc: Once again it was time for the VLN Endurance Racing Championship. While the drivers were doing their test laps, we had a look behind the scenes and explored what went on in the pit lanes.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Episode 16
programme.desc: In this episode we invite you to witness the progress of driver Uwe Nittle as he got ready for qualifying at the Truck Grand Prix.

programme.title: Put Your Car On TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Chevy Camaro vs Mercedes SLS AMG
programme.desc: Mylene Gomera and Saif Hattawi invite car freaks from the Middle East to show off their souped-up vehicles on the "Walk" at Jumeirah Beach in Dubai. In this episode, a Chevrolet Camaro competes against a Mercedes SLS AMG.

programme.title: Put Your Car On TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 BMW X5 vs Mercedes SLK 230
programme.desc: If you like souped-up and luxuriously equipped vehicles, Jumeirah Beach in Dubai is the place to be. There, the cars are judged and there is also something to win. This episode features a BMW X5 and a Mercedes SLK 230.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S03 : E160 Road Stars
programme.desc: The Silvretta Hochalpenstrasse in Austria is the ideal playground for the lightweight power packs Lotus Elise and Roding Roadster. Also: the elegant but still very powerful Porsche 911 Targa 4S.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E106 Porsche to the Max
programme.desc: The Techart Grand GT by Porsche's house tuner is a souped-up Panamera. But the off-the-shelf GTS model also has its treats. Patrick Simon took this monster to the track. In addition: Ruf's anniversary model RT 35. And: the 911 Carrera 4.

programme.title: Put Your Car On TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 BMW X6M vs Nissan Patrol
programme.desc: At Jumeirah Beach in Dubai, car owners can have their souped-up vehicles judged in three categories and win an overnight stay at the Sofitel Hotel. This time, a BMW X6M, a Ford F250 and a Nissan Patrol are in the running.

programme.title: Put Your Car On TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Nova SS vs Honda Accord
programme.desc: On Put Your Car On TV, car fans from the Middle East can have their darlings rated in terms of speed, style and sound. Included this time: a Nova SS, a special Honda Accord and a car clad in crystals.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Episode 15
programme.desc: We present the highlights of last week. The 24 hour race was exciting, as usual. In addition, we explored the 'Strong Man Run' and took a look at the tourist drivers

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Episode 12
programme.desc: Once again it was time for the VLN Endurance Racing Championship. While the drivers were doing their test laps, we had a look behind the scenes and explored what went on in the pit lanes.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 Porsche Special
programme.desc: Porsche is a world-famous brand and a household name when it comes to sports cars. For over 70 years fans have been attracted to Porsche automobiles. But when was the big rise of the brand and when was their first car created?

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S03 : E66 Space Savers
programme.desc: The Volkswagen Samba transforms from pack mule into high-priced classic. And: a former letter box with 37 seats. The 1962 'Graf and Stift' post bus now takes tourists to their hotel.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Changing the model
programme.desc: BMW got into the electric mobility business with their ActiveE and i3 models. We visited the company's technology office in Silicon Valley. Also: the Stuck brothers at the test track with the Mercedes C 63 AMG. And: the Audi A3 Sportback.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E52 The big journey
programme.desc: The Mercedes-AMG E63 S is a wolf in sheep's clothing. This station wagon has more power than the Nissan GTR 'Godzilla'. Also: the Porsche Panamera GTS feels at home on the motorway and on the race track. And: Audi's powerful all-purpose executive car RS6.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Pikes Peak
programme.desc: The Pikes Peak Hill Climb is a rather unique type of car race in the mountains of Colorado, USA. It's exciting, tough and dangerous, and in 1987, two-time world rally champion Walter Roehrl took his Audi Sport Quattro S1 to the top.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Rally Sport 1983
programme.desc: In 1983 Audi introduced the Quattro 4x4 drive to the rally world, adding a new dimension to rally racing. The races became tougher and more brutal. The strain on drivers, vehicles and mechanics alike was extremely intense.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E38 Scrapyard Gold
programme.desc: It is not too unusual to find hidden gems of automotive history in a perfect condition in barns or scrap yards. Also: the MGC GT Sebring, that was built for the 12 Hours of Sebring race.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E47 British Sportscar Rarities
programme.desc: In the early 20th century people used to travel in vehicles like the Morgan Threewheeler, a mixture between motorcycle and car, thus avoiding the British tax on cars. We got hold of a 1936 Morgan Threewheeler and went for a ride.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Le Mans 1952
programme.desc: The year 1952 saw several premieres at the legendary 24-hour endurance race of Le Mans. After 22 years Mercedes-Benz returned to the famous circuit, and Ferrari started to use factory works team cars for the first time.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Ferruccio Lamborghini
programme.desc: In 1964, Ferruccio Lamborghini set himself the goal to build the best sports cars in the world, a bold move, being located only a few kilometers from Ferrari.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Walter Röhrl
programme.desc: One cannot talk about rally sports without mentioning the name Walter Röhrl. From an early age, Röhrl showed his talent in rally sports and won the European, World and other international rally championships several times in his career.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 German Touring Car Championship 1992
programme.desc: The Deutsche Tourenwagen Meisterschaft was one of the most important racing series in German motorsports. It was difficult, tough and well-known for its die-hard battles between the international competitors. We present the highlights of the 1992 race.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Audi Quattro - Triumph of an Idea, 1980
programme.desc: With the launch of the four-wheel drive 4WD in 1980, Audi changed the rally world. The company's advanced engineering not only improved the handling of the rally cars, but also confronted the drivers with new challenges.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Amphicar 770
programme.desc: The Amphicar 770 is a rare classic and a unique vehicle. It may not be the fastest car on the street, but it’s ready to be used on the water as well and drives like a motorboat.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 MG TC
programme.desc: The MG TC is a sporty, but also extremely spartan car with technology from the late 1940s. We accompanied the owner of a MG TC on his way to pass the TÜV, the German technical certification test.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S03 : E62 Auction Classics
programme.desc: Nowadays the gull-winged classic DeLorean is an automotive investment. Also: 100 dream cars under the hammer at a classic car auction in Switzerland. And: modern classics with investment potential like the Mercedes 190E 2.3 16V.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E41 Vintage Cars Worldwide
programme.desc: In Thailand a Mercedes 190 SL and other souped-up classics take part in the Bangkok Classic Car Ride. Plus: an Oldsmobile convertible on Venezuela's most beautiful island. And: classic cars from the US as a tourist attraction in Cuba.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Animal-like Cars
programme.desc: In Los Angeles, Dean Malay put the Hollywood appeal of the Volkswagen Beetle Convertible to the test. Also: at the BMW Design Night the Bavarian manufacturer showcased its newest creations. And: the Stuck brothers with the Lexus IS-F at the test track.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 To the Top!
programme.desc: The Audi Sport Quattro S1 was a rally legend. We checked how the company's series vehicle A1 Quattro fares in comparison. Also: the Stuck brothers take the Ford Focus ST to the test track. And: the spacey, but cute electric microcar Renault Twizy.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.sub-title: S01 : E33 Pickups
programme.desc: In Europe pickups are mainly used commercially. In the US these trucks are as common as SUVs. We compared the Volkswagen Amarok to the Toyota Hilux. Also: current US pickups, the Chevrolet Colorado and GMC's Sierra and Canyon.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 Tuned SUVs
programme.desc: SUVs usually are rather impressive right out of the factory, but there are many tuning and customizing options. In this episode we present Kelleners BMW X5, the Mercedes Brabus B63 and the Porsche Cayenne tuned by Techart.

programme.title: Made in ...
programme.sub-title: S01 : E33 Eurocopter
programme.desc: The Eurocopter EC 135 is the most successful and best-selling helicopter in the world and a multi-talent. Whether as a VIP shuttle, in air rescue or for the police. This all-rounder is even used for military tasks.

programme.title: Made in ...
programme.sub-title: S01 : E23 Unimog
programme.desc: It is a synonym and a touchstone for four-wheel drive movement. It is the symbol for quality of commercial vehicle constructions worldwide. Mercedes-Benz manufactured for the 60th birthday a new Unimog.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Ferruccio Lamborghini
programme.desc: In 1964, Ferruccio Lamborghini set himself the goal to build the best sports cars in the world, a bold move, being located only a few kilometers from Ferrari.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Alois Ruf
programme.desc: Alois Ruf is the founder of a small, but well-known car manufacturing company in Bavaria that specialises in building their own vision of street legal super sports cars on the foundation of Porsche bodys.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.sub-title: S01 : E35 Offroad Minis
programme.desc: Small 4x4's are on the rise, as it doesn't need to be size that matters when it comes to having fun in the city or off-road. We take a look at mini SUVs, the Fiat's 500 X, the Cross Polo and Cross up! by Volkswagen and BMW's X1 XDrive.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 Land Rover Special
programme.desc: The Land Rover Defender is one of the oldest offroad car models. We took a look at this iconic vehicle and 70 years of Land Rover history. Also: we took the Range Rover Evoque, the most recent model of the British brand, to the legendary Silk Road.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E47 Close to the ground
programme.desc: In their 4 series BMW took into account that sporty vehicles need a low center of gravity. In the manufacturer's range of vehicles this model is closest to the asphalt. We compared the BMW 435i and Porsche's Cayman S and took a look at the Alfa Romeo 4C.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E49 Athletes on stilts - Power SUVs
programme.desc: Since the rising popularity of SUVs compact models have become a new trend, so the manufacturers started offering more models and pushing their performance. We took a look at the competitors Audi RS Q3, Mercedes-AMG GLA 45 and Porsche Macan Turbo.

programme.title: Motorcycles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E32 Stereotypes on Two Wheels
programme.desc: Scooters, stereotypes on two wheels? It doesn't always have to be a classic Vespa! We take a look at three alternatives: Kymco's big scooter xciting 500 i that feels like riding on a sofa, Piaggio's three-wheeler MP3 500 with two front wheels that promises more dynamic driving pleasure and the powerful electric scooter e-max from China.

programme.title: Motorcycles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E38 Trikes
programme.desc: Whether taking it easy and cruising, or firing it up and drifting - trikes, scooters and three-wheeled bike conversions all have their own charm and driving dynamics, especially the trikes. We take a closer look at four rather exotic motorcycles: the Rewaco RF1 Turbo, Piaggio's MP3 and bike conversions for the Suzuki 800 Intruder and the Triumph Rocket III Touring.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 Fiat Dino
programme.desc: The Fiat Dino Spider is one of the most beautiful cabriolets of the 1960s. Its impeccable design was created by Pininfarina, and only 525 units were built. Under its hood growls a Ferrari V6 engine.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E45 50 Years Corvette Stingray
programme.desc: 1963 saw the launch of the Chevrolet Corvette Stingray, the brand's answer to established sports car models by Jaguar, Maserati and others. Many consider it to be the most exciting sports car of all time. We pay tribute to this classic.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S03 : E79 Classic Technology Carriers
programme.desc: We followed the restoration of the unique Bayer K67 research vehicle, the first all-plastic car in the world, developed in 1967 by the pharmaceutical giant Bayer.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S03 : E78 Iconic Racing Classics
programme.desc: Cars like the Ford GT 40, the Jaguar D-Type or the Mercedes 300 SL wrote history on the race track and now break records at auctions. A sumptuously restored 300 SL will start at the most famous classic car rally in the world, the Mille Miglia.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 Cruising
programme.desc: We explored how the Z4 Roadster feels as a cabriolet. Also: the small company Boom Trikes Automotive have become Europe's leading trike manufacturer. And: cruising through Los Angeles in a Volkswagen Beetle convertible.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E29 Diesel Engines
programme.desc: It's all about Diesel this time. We compared the BMW 120d and the 125i. In addition: Audi's diesel-hybrid model R18 e-tron quattro dominated the endurance race in Le Mans. And: the diesel-powered Jaguar XF Sport Brake.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S01 : E96 Red Bull Show Run
programme.desc: Red Bull takes a Formula One car on a city tour to promote the New Jersey Grand Prix. Also: Bentley proves that a V8 engine can also set elegant accents. And: McLaren presents the MP4-12 C Spider.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S01 : E81 Porsche Cayman R
programme.desc: Not only Porsche fans will like the sportiest Cayman model. Also: with the Juke-R, Nissan combined a GT-R sports car and a crossover. And: the BMW G-Power is the fastest station wagon on this planet.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Graduate
programme.desc: A vehicle jumps at full speed over four cars, which explode one after the other. It’s a matter of precision and timing for the Stunt Heroes. Also, up-and-coming stuntwoman Tina has to prove her skills.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Very First Time
programme.desc: The team is shooting a car rollover. Stunt coordinator Carl wants to go all out. He adds an exciting shootout to the mix. Also, he has a surprise for his boss. During the rollover he wants him to sit in the passenger seat, for the very first time.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Episode 15
programme.desc: We present the highlights of last week. The 24 hour race was exciting, as usual. In addition, we explored the 'Strong Man Run' and took a look at the tourist drivers

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 Episode 19
programme.desc: The roaring sounds of engines and exhausts usually dominate the Nuerburgring, but we focused on something a bit quieter this time. How about taking part in a 15 mile bike ride around the ring, or perhaps a 16 mile run?

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S03 : E193 Open Air Feeling
programme.desc: The Mercedes-AMG C43 was supposed to act as the entry-level model to the brand's cabriolet world. With the 718 Boxster, Porsche offers a convertible at a competitive price as well.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E109 Hot Supercars
programme.desc: Aston Martin V8 Vantage, Porsche 918 Spyder, Bentley Mulsanne, Audi R8 V10 or Bugatti Veyron Grand Sport Super Vitesse. These cars aren't really comparable as each vehicle is unique in its elegance and performance.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S01 : E84 Kelleners KS1 RS
programme.desc: The BMW One M Coupe from the former race-driver Ralf Kelleners: the KS1 RS is one of the highlights in 2012. Also: another big score from Porsche, the beautiful 911 cabriolet. And: the Bentley Continental GT V8 is a dream car.

programme.title: Motorcycles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E29 Enduro Park Hechlingen
programme.desc: The BMW Enduro Park Hechlingen in Bavaria offers off-road driving pleasure both for beginners and pros alike on 26 hectares. We take a look at what this exciting place has to offer for enduro enthusiasts. Also: what does the inexpensive Hyosung ST 700 i from South Korea have to offer? And: the big-wheeled scooter from Taiwan, the Kymco People GT 300i.

programme.title: Motorcycles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E30 Triumph Thunderbird
programme.desc: The parallel twin-cylinder Triumph Thunderbird. Is the powerful 1.6 litre bike able to gain a foothold outside of the British Isles? Also: Harley-Davidson's black chopper Sportster 883 Iron, a starter bike for purists. And: Bike & Music, a spectacle for motorbike and stunt enthusiasts at Europe's biggest motorway rest area in Geiselwind, Germany.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 Episode 19
programme.desc: The roaring sounds of engines and exhausts usually dominate the Nuerburgring, but we focused on something a bit quieter this time. How about taking part in a 15 mile bike ride around the ring, or perhaps a 16 mile run?

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Episode 14
programme.desc: The fourth race of the VLN season is usually regarded as a dress rehearsal for the 24-hour race. For the top teams and best drivers it is the last opportunity for a really thorough test.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E38 Scrapyard Gold
programme.desc: It is not too unusual to find hidden gems of automotive history in a perfect condition in barns or scrap yards. Also: the MGC GT Sebring, that was built for the 12 Hours of Sebring race.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S03 : E71 Mobility in Eastern Europe
programme.desc: In the 1950s, companies like Tatra from Czechoslovakia introduced advanced, even pioneering automobiles. The clientele was exclusive, which is why now these streamlined cars are big rarities. We tracked down the owner of a 1937 Tatra T87.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E51 Open Air Concert
programme.desc: As an homage to driving top-down we took a look at three of the most beautiful convertibles. The animalistic sound of the Audi S3 convertible's 4-cylinder is astonishing. But what about the Nissan 370 Z Roadster? Or Porsche's Boxster GTS?

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 Topless on the road
programme.desc: Convertibles suggest to the feeling of freedom while driving a car. We took a look at what Opel's Cascada and Adam convertible models had to offer. Also: what does the BMW 3 series Gran Turismo have in common with its bigger brother from the 5 series?

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E124 Special: 24h of Le Mans - Track Days
programme.desc: Two weeks before the start of the 24 hours of Le Mans, all teams are busy testing their cars on the traditional long distance track in France. Bad weather, accidents and a lot of tension, we documented the official test days in 2013.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S03 : E190 V8 Power
programme.desc: We took a look at Mercedes-Benz's first convertible model in their S-class. Also: for the Chevrolet Camaro's 50th anniversary in 2016 the brand released the sixth generation of their classic. And: a mountain cruise with the Corvette C7 convertible.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Episode 12
programme.desc: Once again it was time for the VLN Endurance Racing Championship. While the drivers were doing their test laps, we had a look behind the scenes and explored what went on in the pit lanes.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Episode 16
programme.desc: In this episode we invite you to witness the progress of driver Uwe Nittle as he got ready for qualifying at the Truck Grand Prix.

programme.title: Put Your Car On TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Chevy Camaro vs Mercedes SLS AMG
programme.desc: Mylene Gomera and Saif Hattawi invite car freaks from the Middle East to show off their souped-up vehicles on the "Walk" at Jumeirah Beach in Dubai. In this episode, a Chevrolet Camaro competes against a Mercedes SLS AMG.

programme.title: Put Your Car On TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 BMW X5 vs Mercedes SLK 230
programme.desc: If you like souped-up and luxuriously equipped vehicles, Jumeirah Beach in Dubai is the place to be. There, the cars are judged and there is also something to win. This episode features a BMW X5 and a Mercedes SLK 230.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S03 : E160 Road Stars
programme.desc: The Silvretta Hochalpenstrasse in Austria is the ideal playground for the lightweight power packs Lotus Elise and Roding Roadster. Also: the elegant but still very powerful Porsche 911 Targa 4S.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E106 Porsche to the Max
programme.desc: The Techart Grand GT by Porsche's house tuner is a souped-up Panamera. But the off-the-shelf GTS model also has its treats. Patrick Simon took this monster to the track. In addition: Ruf's anniversary model RT 35. And: the 911 Carrera 4.

programme.title: Put Your Car On TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 BMW X6M vs Nissan Patrol
programme.desc: At Jumeirah Beach in Dubai, car owners can have their souped-up vehicles judged in three categories and win an overnight stay at the Sofitel Hotel. This time, a BMW X6M, a Ford F250 and a Nissan Patrol are in the running.

programme.title: Put Your Car On TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Nova SS vs Honda Accord
programme.desc: On Put Your Car On TV, car fans from the Middle East can have their darlings rated in terms of speed, style and sound. Included this time: a Nova SS, a special Honda Accord and a car clad in crystals.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Episode 15
programme.desc: We present the highlights of last week. The 24 hour race was exciting, as usual. In addition, we explored the 'Strong Man Run' and took a look at the tourist drivers

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Episode 12
programme.desc: Once again it was time for the VLN Endurance Racing Championship. While the drivers were doing their test laps, we had a look behind the scenes and explored what went on in the pit lanes.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E151 Power Packs With Space
programme.desc: Jaguar's supercharged V8 XF RS Sportbreak, the Porsche Panamera Turbo S and the Audi S8 combine space and comfort with the performance of a sports car. We compare these three contenders.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 Porsche Special
programme.desc: Porsche is a world-famous brand and a household name when it comes to sports cars. For over 70 years fans have been attracted to Porsche automobiles. But when was the big rise of the brand and when was their first car created?

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S03 : E66 Space Savers
programme.desc: The Volkswagen Samba transforms from pack mule into high-priced classic. And: a former letter box with 37 seats. The 1962 'Graf and Stift' post bus now takes tourists to their hotel.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Amphicar 770

programme.desc: The MG TC is a sporty, but also extremely spartan car with technology from the late 1940s. We accompanied the owner of a MG TC on his way to pass the TÜV, the German technical certification test.

programme.sub-title: S03 : E62 Auction Classics
programme.desc: Nowadays the gull-winged classic DeLorean is an automotive investment. Also: 100 dream cars under the hammer at a classic car auction in Switzerland. And: modern classics with investment potential like the Mercedes 190E 2.3 16V.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E109 Hot Supercars
programme.desc: Aston Martin V8 Vantage, Porsche 918 Spyder, Bentley Mulsanne, Audi R8 V10 or Bugatti Veyron Grand Sport Super Vitesse. These cars aren't really comparable as each vehicle is unique in its elegance and performance.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E106 Porsche to the Max
programme.desc: The Techart Grand GT by Porsche's house tuner is a souped-up Panamera. But the off-the-shelf GTS model also has its treats. Patrick Simon took this monster to the track. In addition: Ruf's anniversary model RT 35. And: the 911 Carrera 4.

programme.title: Top 10 Show
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Ten Slowest Cars
programme.desc: Cars are often defined by their speed, but we chose to decelerate things and take a look at our top 10 selection of the most sluggish cars.

programme.title: Top 10 Show
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 The Most Affordable Hybrid Models
programme.desc: If you are interested in hybrid technology and electric mobility and can't afford a Bentley or Rolls-Royce, this top 10 list is for you. We present our selection of affordable hybrid models.

programme.title: Put Your Car On TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Nova SS vs Honda Accord
programme.desc: On Put Your Car On TV, car fans from the Middle East can have their darlings rated in terms of speed, style and sound. Included this time: a Nova SS, a special Honda Accord and a car clad in crystals.

programme.title: Put Your Car On TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Ford Mustang vs Chevy Corvette
programme.desc: Car lovers from the Middle East present their vehicles at the Sofitel Dubai Jumeirah Beach. There is a weekend at the hotel to be won. A Ford Mustang and a limited edition Chevrolet Corvette are up for judging this time.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S01 : E97 British Car Empire
programme.desc: The McLaren MP4-12C isn't just a high-performance sports car, it can also be used as an everyday car - for those who can afford it. In addition: a Rolls Royce Silver Cloud that is covered with Swarowski crystals. Also: the Jaguar XFR and Lotus Evora S.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S01 : E95 AC Schnitzer ACS5
programme.desc: Car tuner AC Schnitzer presents its ACS5 Sport model based on the BMW M5. Also: Audi's R8 models Coupe, Spyder and V10 Plus. And: a comparison between four super sports cars.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Episode 10
programme.desc: Christian Menzel asked our presenter Miriam to participate in a driver safety training where he showed tips and tricks on what to do in emergency situations.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 Episode 17
programme.desc: The RCN Challenge is the ultimate BMW driving experience. We also paid a visit to the Devils Diner, the track's indoor meeting place for drivers.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Salto Mortale
programme.desc: The Stunt Heroes face a new mission: performing a front-flip through the air with a stuntman behind the wheel of an estate wagon. Stuntmen Daniel and Lars display a brilliant fight choreography in some spectacular driving scenes.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.sub-title: S02 : E23 The Flying Quad
programme.desc: Action Concept wreck more than 100 cars each year for their stunts. In this episode, a quad rider is chased by a car. The car is crashed in the process and the quad bike also has to be destroyed, but the question is how?

programme.title: Put Your Car On TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Mercedes SLS vs Audi R8
programme.desc: Mylene Gomera and Saif Hattawi once again invite the owners of the most extraordinary cars to Dubai, where they award points for speed, style and sound. This time, they will be joined by a limited edition Mercedes SLS and an Audi R8.

programme.title: Put Your Car On TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 BMW X5 vs Mercedes SLK 230
programme.desc: If you like souped-up and luxuriously equipped vehicles, Jumeirah Beach in Dubai is the place to be. There, the cars are judged and there is also something to win. This episode features a BMW X5 and a Mercedes SLK 230.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S03 : E203 Performance-SUVs
programme.desc: With its Macan Turbo, Porsche sets the benchmark in the SUV segment. The optional performance package increases the output from 400 to 440 HP. A serious competitor bears the Maserati brand. With the Levante, die Italian carmaker wants to stir up the competitive market for sporty SUVs.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E151 Power Packs With Space
programme.desc: Jaguar's supercharged V8 XF RS Sportbreak, the Porsche Panamera Turbo S and the Audi S8 combine space and comfort with the performance of a sports car. We compare these three contenders.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S03 : E79 Classic Technology Carriers
programme.desc: We followed the restoration of the unique Bayer K67 research vehicle, the first all-plastic car in the world, developed in 1967 by the pharmaceutical giant Bayer.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S03 : E78 Iconic Racing Classics
programme.desc: Cars like the Ford GT 40, the Jaguar D-Type or the Mercedes 300 SL wrote history on the race track and now break records at auctions. A sumptuously restored 300 SL will start at the most famous classic car rally in the world, the Mille Miglia.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 Cruising
programme.desc: We explored how the Z4 Roadster feels as a cabriolet. Also: the small company Boom Trikes Automotive have become Europe's leading trike manufacturer. And: cruising through Los Angeles in a Volkswagen Beetle convertible.

programme.title: FAILARMY: 50 VS. 50
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 FAILARMY: 50 VS. 50 | Emojis vs. Horoscopes
programme.desc: An unconventional match up, it’s the star signs against emojis to see who our reigning fail champion will be.

programme.title: FAILARMY: 50 VS. 50
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 FAILARMY: 50 VS. 50 | College vs. Jobs
programme.desc: Do you think failing stops when you trade college for the workplace? See where the bigger flops happen!

programme.title: FAILARMY: 50 VS. 50
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 FAILARMY: 50 VS. 50 | Bad Habits vs. Resolutions
programme.desc: A battle for the ages to see where the bigger fails lie: in our bad habits or our well-intended resolutions.

programme.title: FailFactory
programme.sub-title: S04 : E09 FailFactory | Ouch
programme.desc: All fails are not created equal. These people got the short end of the stick with extra painful mistakes.

programme.title: FailFactory
programme.sub-title: S04 : E11 FailFactory | New Year, New Me
programme.desc: A lot of pain without any gain.

programme.title: FailFactory
programme.sub-title: S04 : E13 FailFactory | Mixed Nuts
programme.desc: Just a bunch of random nut jobs competing for dumbest fail.

programme.title: FailFactory
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 FailFactory | Celebrate Bad Times, Come On

programme.sub-title: S05 : E06 FailFactory | The Grass is Always Greener

programme.sub-title: S2014 : E05 Raymond James Stadium - Tampa, FL
programme.desc: Monster Jam's 2014 season at Raymond James Stadium in Tampa, FL, featuring championship race and freestyle competitions.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2005 : E05 Georgia Dome - Atlanta, GA - Freestyle
programme.desc: Don't miss your favorite trucks and drivers compete with freestyle action from the Georgia Dome, on January 8, 2005.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2024 : E06 NRG Stadium - Houston, TX
programme.desc: Monster Jam Stadium Championship Series East drives into the Rodeo Capital. Grave Digger’s Tyler Menninga holds the series points lead and looks for his third consecutive event win as Tom Meents returns to the stadium where he debuted Maximum Destruction 20 years ago.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2017 : E20 MetLife Stadium - East Rutherford, NJ - Freestyle
programme.desc: Day two in East Rutherford continues at MetLife stadium with the freestyle competition.

programme.title: Best of Monster Jam
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Best of World Finals and Muddy Trucks
programme.desc: Even when there's rain or mud, these monster trucks bring their A-Game. Get down and dirty with this compilation of muddy Monster Jam trucks! AND - Witness some of the best freestyles ever to hit the World Finals field from 2000 to 2011.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2024 : E01 Angel Stadium - Anaheim, CA
programme.desc: Monster Jam kicks off the 2024 season with the Superstar Challenge in Anaheim, California. Sixteen of the sport’s biggest stars compete on two teams through three competitions. Krysten Anderson looks to lead Team Neon to victory against Bari Musawwir’s Team Nitro. Who will be named the Most Valuable Driver? Find out when Monster Jam brings this exciting team format to Angel Stadium.

programme.title: World Finals
programme.sub-title: S2011 : E02 World Finals XII - Sam Boyd Stadium - Las Vegas, NV - Freestyle 1/2
programme.desc: All the freestyle action from Monster Jam World Finals 12 on March 26, 2011.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2022 : E10 US Bank Stadium - Minneapolis, MN
programme.desc: Monster Jam’s 2022 season continues with round 10 of the Stadium Championship Series, at US Bank Stadium in Minneapolis, MN.
